body:
Comment 15: 
Maybe my binutils isn't configured correctly. I just had the stuff on the webpage:

../binutils-2.21/configure --enable-gold --prefix=/opt/gold

but I'm going to try this now:

../binutils-2.21/configure --with-ppl=/opt/ppl --enable-gold --disable-werror
--enable-lto --enable-plugins --prefix=/opt/gold
